application:
Assistive Rehabilitation skeletonDumper Real App
Camera
yarpdatadumper --name /skeletonDumper/skeletons-img --type image_jpg --rxTime --txTime localhost
yarpdatadumper --name /dump/skeletons-data --rxTime --txTime localhost
yarpdatadumper --name /dump/depth --type depth --rxTime --txTime localhost
yarpdatadumper --name /skeletonDumper/opc-save --rxTime --txTime localhost
yarpdatadumper --name /dump/nav-save --rxTime --txTime localhost
yarpdatadumper --name /dump/gaze-save --rxTime --txTime localhost
Robot joints
yarpdatadumper --name /dump/robot-left-arm --rxTime --txTime localhost
yarpdatadumper --name /dump/robot-left-wrist-tripod --rxTime --txTime localhost
yarpdatadumper --name /dump/robot-right-arm --rxTime --txTime localhost
yarpdatadumper --name /dump/robot-right-wrist-tripod --rxTime --txTime localhost
yarpdatadumper --name /dump/robot-head --rxTime --txTime localhost
yarpdatadumper --name /dump/robot-torso --rxTime --txTime localhost
yarpdatadumper --name /dump/robot-torso-tripod --rxTime --txTime localhost
Connection Camera
/depthCamera/rgbImage:o /yarpOpenPose/image:i mjpeg
/depthCamera/depthImage:o /yarpOpenPose/float:i fast_tcp+send.portmonitor+file.depthimage_compression_zlib+recv.portmonitor+file.depthimage_compression_zlib+type.dll
/yarpOpenPose/image:o /viewer/skeleton mjpeg
/yarpOpenPose/image:o /dump/skeletons-img mjpeg
/yarpOpenPose/target:o /dump/skeletons-data fast_tcp
/yarpOpenPose/float:o /dump/depth fast_tcp
/opc/broadcast:o /dump/opc-save fast_tcp
/navController/state:o /dump/nav-save fast_tcp
/cer_gaze-controller/state:o /dump/gaze-save fast_tcp
Connection Robot
/cer/left_arm/state:o /dump/robot-left-arm fast_tcp
/cer/left_wrist_tripod/state:o /dump/robot-left-wrist-tripod fast_tcp
/cer/right_arm/state:o /dump/robot-right-arm fast_tcp
/cer/right_wrist_tripod/state:o /dump/robot-right-wrist-tripod fast_tcp
/cer/head/state:o /dump/robot-head fast_tcp
/cer/torso/state:o /dump/robot-torso fast_tcp
/cer/torso_tripod/state:o /dump/robot-torso-tripod fast_tcp
